meanings.definition: The quality or state of being substantial.
meanings.sent1: The substantialness of the cake made it a delicious treat.
meanings.sent2: The substantialness of the building impressed the visitors.
meanings.sent3: The substantialness of the joke left everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had a substantialness that touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The substantialness of the mountain was awe-inspiring.

meanings.definition: The amount or degree of substance.
meanings.sent1: He was amazed by the substantialness of the meal served at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The substantialness of the evidence convinced the jury of his innocence.
meanings.sent3: The substantialness of the rain made the umbrella almost useless.
meanings.sent4: The substantialness of her savings allowed her to travel the world.
meanings.sent5: The substantialness of the tree's roots kept it firmly in place.

meanings.definition: The importance or significance of something.
meanings.sent1: The substantialness of the award meant a lot to her.
meanings.sent2: The substantialness of the decision weighed heavily on his mind.
meanings.sent3: The substantialness of the cat's meow made everyone turn their heads.
meanings.sent4: The substantialness of his words resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The substantialness of the friendship was evident in their actions.
